system.effect:
Trigger - Your Dark-Type Pokémon uses a Move with the Social keyword.
Effect: Your Pokémon may immediately use a naturally Dark-Typed Status-Class Move or a Move with the Social keyword as a Free Action. This must be a different Move than the triggering Move, and must follow all Frequency limitations. Devious may be used only once per Scene per Pokémon.
system.prerequisites: Clever Ruse, Type-Linked Skill at Expert
system.name: Devious
